node.html:
• Performed end-to-end testing on ESB-Based Middleware services to ensure accurate and stable integration between multiple enterprise systems.
  • Designed and executed Postman test scenarios, covering request/response validation, parameters, headers, authentication, and edge cases.
  • Monitored service flows and analyzed logs to identify integration issues and ensure reliable transaction processing.
  • Collaborated with developers and system teams to validate fixes and maintain system stability.

• Designed detailed test cases based on business and technical requirements to validate application functionality.
  • Conducted manual and automated testing, including functional and regression testing, to ensure software quality.
  • Identified, documented, and tracked defects using Jira, working closely with development teams for resolution.
  • Developed and maintained automation test scripts to improve test coverage and reduce repetitive manual effort.

• Developed and maintained an internal web dashboard to monitor warehouse operations and inventory movement.
  • Collaborated with warehouse and operational teams to gather requirements and align technical solutions with business needs.
  • Debugged and optimized existing code to improve application performance and user experience.
  • Built responsive interfaces using PHP, MySQL, and Bootstrap.
